data.name: Lemon vs. Teddy
data.detailed_description:
It's your chance to destroy the world. All you need is to find two sausages and a magic gem. However, Teddy, a criminal known for the annihilation of over a million people, also wants them. Are you brave enough to defeat him and completely destroy the entire world?

Key Features:
  • Turn-based combat reminiscent of retro jRPGs
  • Fight Biscuits, Glasses of water, Bananas and many more nasty enemies while thinking about the meaning of life (or anything else you want)
  • Random encounters that are easy to avoid - just hold down SHIFT if you don't feel like fighting
  • Sticker system that allows you to customize your characters
  • Optional bosses that only the best players will be able to defeat
  • Crazy abilities such as Deadline, Floppy disk chaos and the legendary Curse of Jxkfdvc
  • Auto-save - forget about save points
  • A convenient quick-heal menu accessible by pressing Q
  • Modifiable EXP and BTC multipliers for players who aren't fond of grinding
  • 100% free!

data.short_description: Become a lemon and destroy the world with sausages before Teddy does it in this combat-focused RPG.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL support
  • Sound Card: Standard audio
